org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.security
Interface IAePrincipal

All Superinterfaces:
java.security.Principal
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAxisPrincipal, AeSimpleNamePrincipal
public interface IAePrincipal
extends java.security.Principal

Extension of the java.security.Principal interface for principal implementations that a) do not implement Principal and/or b) support role checks directly .NET and Axis principals fall into both categories above

Method Summary
 boolean isUserInRole(java.lang.String aRolename)
          Checks if a user is in a given role
